DOC.brief_summary: The goal project determine whether genetic information use predict response internet-based treatment depression . Several study indicate complete internet-based treatment depression , call Deprexis , significantly improve symptom depression . However , everyone improves . The purpose study determine whether genetic profile predict likely improve .
DOC.brief_title: Can Genetics Predict Treatment Response Computerized Self-help Program Depression ?
DOC.criteria: Englishspeaking Have reliable access internet ( i.e. , dialup broadband access ) Be willing donate saliva DNA research Have current symptom depression Be stable medication and/or therapy ( i.e . change within 2 week study entry ) Any diagnosis psychotic bipolar disorder Meeting alcohol/drug dependence past year Having current suicidal risk warrant crisis intervention
